# pyRegBL

Python package to get RegBL informations easily.

## Get started

Install the package with pip

```bash
pip install pyRegBL
```

## Usage

Check the getting started notebook on GitHub. 

## Miscellaneous

- RegBL character catalog : https://www.housing-stat.ch/files/882-2200.pdf
